ComicInfo.Summary:
Even with the aid of some unexpected forces, Dorothy and her friends are losing the fight to reclaim the Emerald City. Our heroes must resort to desperate measures if they want to have any hope at all of finally defeating the Wizard. And there must always be a balance to magic. So, even if the Emerald City is restored to its glory, what will be the cost to Oz itself?
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Drew Edward Johnson & Grostieta | 1 | B | Cover B | Sheldon Goh & Hedwin Zaldivar | 2 | C | Cover C | Laura Braga & Ceci de la Cruz | 3 | D | Cover D | Geebo Vigonte & Ivan Nunes | 4 |
